title: Mario Mutsch - Wikipedia
snippet: Mario Mutsch (born 3 September 1984) is a former professional footballer who played as a defensive midfielder. Born in Belgium, he played for the Luxembourg national team. Born in St. Vith, Mutsch started his career at Belgian lower leagues sides Spa and Kelmis (La Calamine) before heading ...

title: Mario Mutsch
snippet: As assistant to the senior team until August 2025, when he continued in a similar capacity under the new head coach Jeff Strasser before fully transitioning to the U21 role, Mutsch contributed to preparations for international qualifiers, drawing on his extensive playing experience to support tactical planning and player integration during campaigns such as the UEFA Nations League and World Cup preliminaries.[37][39] In July 2025, Mutsch was promoted to head coach of the Luxembourg under-21 national team, marking a step up in his responsibilities within the national youth structure.[8][40] As
